system.descriptionText: Reduce all Critical Damage by 4, gain +10 to Jink Actions. Suffer no Damage from Ram Actions. All Repair Tests have additional -20 as this is a sacred piece of technology.

description.value: Reduce all Critical Damage by 4, gain +10 to Jink Actions. Suffer no Damage from Ram Actions. All Repair Tests have additional -20 as this is a sacred piece of technology.
